title: My African Dream
description: My African Dream finds Millicent Cramer in the heart of Kenya, a world she only ever dreamed about. Even her wildest imagination could not prepare her for life on African soil, but what she experiences there changes her life forever. She finds the harsh beauty overwhelming; the people comforting; and even stumbles on loveâ€¦but the biggest thing she discovers is a purpose for her life - a calling far beyond anything she had experienced before.
author: Mario Saincic
